languages.text: "Самое время отложить оружие и сесть за стол переговоров".
"Now is the time to lay down your arms and come to the negotiating table."
languages.original_text: "Самое время отложить оружие и сесть за стол переговоров".

traits.locale_text: "Now is the time to lay down your arms and sit down to negotiate."
"Now is the time to lay down your arms and sit down to negotiate."
"Now is the time to lay down your arms and sit down to negotiate."
"Now is the time to lay down your arms and sit down to negotiate."
"Now is the time to lay down your arms and come to the negotiating table."
"Now is the time to lay down your arms and come to the negotiating table."

languages.text: “是时候放下武器，坐在桌边好好谈谈了。”
languages.original_text: "Now is the time to lay down your arms and come to the negotiating table."

traits.locale_text: “是时候放下武器，坐下来好好谈谈了。”

languages.text: 「今こそ武器を捨てて、交渉の席に着くんだ」
languages.original_text: "Now is the time to lay down your arms and come to the negotiating table."

traits.locale_text: 「今こそ武器を捨てて、交渉の席に着くんだ」

languages.text: «Ahora es el momento de bajar las armas y sentarse a negociar».
languages.original_text: "Now is the time to lay down your arms and come to the negotiating table."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora es el momento de bajar las armas y sentarse a negociar».

languages.text: "Es wird Zeit, die Waffen niederzulegen und an den Verhandlungstisch zu kommen."
languages.original_text: "Now is the time to lay down your arms and come to the negotiating table."

traits.locale_text: "Es heißt jetzt, die Waffen niederzulegen und an den Verhandlungstisch zu kommen."

languages.text: « L'heure est venue de déposer vos armes et de prendre place à la table des négociations. »
languages.original_text: "Now is the time to lay down your arms and come to the negotiating table."

traits.locale_text: « L'heure est venue de déposer vos armes et de vous asseoir à la table des négociations. »

languages.text: "Şimdi silahlarını bırakma ve görüşme masasına oturma zamanı."
languages.original_text: "Now is the time to lay down your arms and come to the negotiating table."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi silahlarını bırakma ve görüşme masasına oturma zamanı."
